sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const ShopItemFunc = (props) => { const {brand,title,description,descriptionFull,price,currency} = props.item; console.log(brand,title) return (

{brand}

{title}

{description}

{descriptionFull}
{currency}{price ? price.toFixed(2): undefined}
) } ShopItemFunc.propTypes = { brand: PropTypes.string.isRequired, title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, description: PropTypes.string, descriptionFull: PropTypes.string, price: PropTypes.number, currency: PropTypes.oneOf(["£","$","€","¥"]), } ShopItemFunc.defaultProps = { description: "description of this item is not available now", } export default ShopItemFunc
